alt.menu: Your wallet address, settings, sign-out and external links

text.title: A browser-based Ethereum wallet secured by the Internet Computer and supporting networked-custody
text.description: $oisy_name provides a seamless on-chain experience to manage your Ethereum assets. Using native web technologies and advanced cryptography, $oisy_name eliminates the need for browser extensions or mobile apps.

text.display_wallet_address_qr: Display wallet address as a QR code
text.icp_deposits: Note: For ICP deposits, use the 'Receive' button in your ICP account to get the right address.
text.use_address_from_to: Use this address to transfer $token to and from your wallet.

info.hold_loading: Hold tight, we are loading some information...
info.hold_loading_wallet: Hold tight, we are loading some initial data for your wallet...

error.no_alchemy_erc20_provider: No Alchemy ERC20 provider for network $network
error.no_etherscan_rest_api: No Etherscan Rest API for network $network
error.no_infura_cketh_provider: No Infura CkETH provider for network $network
error.no_infura_ckerc20_provider: No Infura CkErc20 provider for network $network
error.no_infura_erc20_provider: No Infura ERC20 provider for network $network
error.no_infura_erc20_icp_provider: No Infura ERC20 Icp provider for network $network
error.loading_balance: Error while loading the ETH balance.
error.erc20_contracts: Error while loading the ERC20 contracts.
error.minter_ckbtc_btc: A configured minter is required to convert ckBTC to BTC.
error.minter_cketh_eth: A configured minter is required to convert ckETH to ETH.
error.minter_btc: A configured minter is required to retrieve BTC.
error.minter_ckbtc_info: A configured minter is required to fetch the ckBTC info
error.minter_cketh_info: A configured minter is required to fetch the ckETH info
error.minter_ckbtc_loading_info: Error while loading the ckBTC minter information.
error.minter_cketh_loading_info: Error while loading the ckETH minter information.
error.btc_fees_estimation: Error while querying the estimation of the BTC fees.
error.btc_withdrawal_statuses: Error while fetching the BTC withdrawal statuses.
error.transaction_price: Error while loading the estimation of the price of a transaction.
error.icrc_canisters: Error while loading the ICRC canisters.
error.loading_wallet_timeout: Your wallet requires some initial data which has not been loaded yet. Please try again.

text.use_with_caution: Learn more about this alpha version. Use with caution.
text.learn_more_about_erc20_icp: Learn more about ERC20 ICP on Ethereum.

text.title: Settings
text.principal_description: Your ID for the $oisy_name. Created by your Internet Identity.
text.session_description: All sessions last 1 hour. After 1 hour, you will need to authenticate again with Internet Identity.
text.testnets_description: Display the test networks (Sepolia) and twin tokens on testnets (ckTESTBTC and ckSepolia).
text.hide_zero_balances_description: Enable this feature to declutter your wallet view by hiding all tokens with a zero balance.

alt.testnets_toggle: Toggle to show or hide testnets

text.use_for_all_tokens: Use for all tokens when receiving from wallets, users or other apps that support this address format.
text.use_for_deposit: Use for ICP deposits from exchanges or other wallets that only support Account IDs.
text.display_account_id_qr: Display ICP Account ID as a QR code
text.account_id_copied: ICP Account ID copied to clipboard.

text.eth_to_cketh_description: Converting $token into $ckToken requires a call to a smart contract on $network and passing your IC principal as argument – $oisy_name simplifies this procedure by enabling you to perform the conversion directly within the wallet.

text.display_bitcoin_address_qr: Display Bitcoin Address as a QR code
text.from_network: Transfer Bitcoin on the BTC network to this address to receive ckBTC.
text.fee_applied: Please note that an estimated inter-network fee of $fee BTC will be applied.

info.check_btc_progress: Checking for incoming BTC already in progress.

error.unexpected_btc: Something went wrong while checking for incoming BTC.

info.ckbtc_certified: Please wait until the ckBTC parameters have been certified.
info.cketh_certified: Please wait until the ckETH parameters have been certified.

assertion.unknown_minimum_ckbtc_amount: The minimum amount of ckBTC required for converting to BTC is unknown.
assertion.unknown_minimum_cketh_amount: The minimum amount of ckETH required for converting to ETH is unknown.
assertion.minimum_ckbtc_amount: The amount falls below the minimum of $amount ckBTC required for converting to BTC.
assertion.minimum_cketh_amount: The amount falls below the minimum withdrawal amount of $amount $symbol.
assertion.minimum_ledger_fees: The amount falls below the ledger fees $symbol.
assertion.insufficient_ethereum_funds_to_cover_the: Insufficient Ethereum funds to cover the fees
assertion.max_gas_gee_per_gas_undefined: Max fee per gas or max priority fee per gas is undefined.
assertion.minter_info_not_loaded: Try again in few seconds, a ckETH configuration parameter is not yet loaded.
assertion.minter_info_not_certified: Try again in few seconds, a ckETH configuration parameter has not yet certified.

error.unexpected: Something went wrong while sending the transaction.
error.metamask_connected: Cannot get your accounts. Is your Metamask open and already connected?
error.metamask_switch_network: Cannot request Metamask to switch to chain ID $chain_id. Is your Metamask using $network_name?
error.erc20_data_undefined: Erc20 transaction Data cannot be undefined or null.
error.data_undefined: Transaction Data cannot be undefined or null.
error.no_identity_calculate_fee: No identity provided to calculate the fee for its principal.
error.invalid_address: The address is invalid. Please try again with a valid address identifier.

text.how_to_convert_eth_to_cketh: Here is how to can convert $token to $ckToken on $oisy_name
text.wait_eth_current_balance: Wait for $token to arrive. Current balance
text.send_fee: Ensure you have also $token to cover the fee. Current balance

error.loading_cketh_helper: Error while loading the ckETH helper contract address. No minter canister ID has been initialized.

text.title: Tokens
text.all_tokens_with_zero_hidden: All tokens with zero balance are currently hidden.

error.loading_metadata: Error while loading the metadata of the token.
error.no_metadata: No metadata for the token are provided. This is unexpected.
error.unexpected_index: Something went wrong while validating the Index canister.

error.unexpected_build: An unexpected error happened while building the list of known tokens.
error.empty: No tokens to enable or disable have been selected.

hide.title: Hide token?
hide.info: You can add this token back in the future by going into “$where” in your wallet view.

alt.context_menu: Context menu for to the selected token
alt.open_etherscan: Open the details of the token on Etherscan
alt.open_dashboard: Open the details of the token on the ICP Dashboard
alt.open_contract_address_block_explorer: Open the contract address on a block explorer

warning.trust_token: Make sure that you trust the token that you are adding. If the token you are adding is controlled by a malicious party, they could try and scam you e.g. by making you believe you received a significant amount of tokens in order to trick you into sending them tokens in return or perform other undesired actions. Learn more about scams and security risks e.g. here.

error.invalid_ledger: The selected token is not linked with an Icrc Ledger canister.
error.invalid_index: The selected token is not linked with an Icrc Index canister.
error.no_metadata: No metadata were fetched for the contract address.
error.unexpected: Something went wrong while saving the token.
error.unexpected_hiding: Something went wrong while hiding the token.
error.loading_metadata: Error while loading the ERC20 contract metadata.
error.not_custom: Only custom token can be hidden.

bitcoin.title: Receive from Bitcoin Network (BTC)
bitcoin.description: ckBTC is a multi-chain bitcoin twin on the Internet Computer created by canister smart contract that directly hold native bitcoin.
bitcoin.note: Note that incoming Bitcoin transactions require 12 confirmations. Check status on a block explorer.

ethereum.title: Receive $token and convert to $ckToken
ethereum.description: With a few steps, transfer and convert your $tkName ($token) from the $network Network to $ckToken directly within the $oisy_name.

text.name: WalletConnect
text.raw_copied: Raw transaction data copied to clipboard.

domain.title: Domain Verification
domain.valid_description: The validation of the proposer's domain passed.
domain.invalid_description: The domain of the proposer's website does not match the sender of the request.
domain.security_risk_description: The proposer's website is flagged as unsafe.
domain.unknown_description: The domain of the proposer cannot be verified.

error.missing_uri: An uri to connect to should be provided.
error.disconnect: An unexpected error happened while disconnecting the wallet. Resetting the connection anyway.
error.connect: An unexpected error happened while trying to connect the wallet.
error.manual_workflow: Please finalize the manual workflow that has already been initiated by opening the WalletConnect modal.
error.skipping_request: Skipping the WalletConnect request as another action is currently in progress through an overlay.
error.unexpected_pair: An unexpected error happened while trying to pair the wallet.
error.no_session_approval: Unexpected error: No session proposal available.
error.unexpected: Unexpected error while communicating with WalletConnect.
error.wallet_not_initialized: Unexpected error. Your wallet address is not initialized.
error.from_address_not_wallet: From address requested for the transaction is not the address of this wallet.
error.request_not_defined: Unexpected error: Request is not defined therefore cannot be processed.
error.unexpected_processing_request: Unexpected error while processing the request with WalletConnect.

alt.open_block_explorer: Open this transaction on a block explorer
alt.open_from_block_explorer: Open the 'From' address on a block explorer
alt.open_to_block_explorer: Open the 'To' address on a block explorer

error.failed_get_transaction: Failed to get the transaction from the provided (hash: $hash). Please reload the wallet dapp.
error.failed_get_mined_transaction: Failed to get the mined transaction (hash: $hash). Please reload the wallet dapp.

error.no_token_loading_transaction: Token not found. Transactions cannot be loaded.
error.uncertified_transactions_removed: Several uncertified transactions were identified and subsequently removed from the displayed lists.
